text: 6:16 Ua Me Ini 33:20; Jon 6:46; Filipai 4:20; Jut 1:25A uabɨra oveghan kogham. An angazangarir ekiamɨn aven iti, ezɨ e an boroghɨn mangɨghan kogham. Tav an ganizir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ gumazitam o amizitam an ganighan kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e zurara an ziam fam, egh mɨkɨm suam, an gavgavim ikɨvɨra ikiam. Bar guizbangɨra!
